sn36.16:1.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn36.16:1.2: “katamā nu kho, ānanda, vedanā, katamo vedanāsamudayo, katamo vedanānirodho, katamā vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā?
sn36.16:1.3: Ko vedanāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇan”ti?
sn36.16:1.4: “Bhagavaṁmūlakā no, bhante, dhammā bhagavaṁnettikā bhagavaṁpaṭisaraṇā. Sādhu, bhante, bhagavantaññeva paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho. Bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
sn36.16:1.5: “Tena hi, ānanda, suṇohi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn36.16:1.6: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
sn36.16:1.9: sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
sn36.16:1.12: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo paṭippassaddho hoti, doso paṭippassaddho hoti, moho paṭippassaddho hotī”ti.
